mapper.insert: insert into member_tr_weixin (member_id, open_member_id, openid, nickname, sex, province, city, country, headimgurl, privilege, unionid, subscribe_time, groupid, tagid_list, subscribe_scene, qr_scene, qr_scene_str, mobile ) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagidList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribeScene,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrScene,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{qrSceneStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
